com.canabang.genietext.core.model.server
Class MessageBreaker

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.core.model.server.MessageBreaker

public class MessageBreaker
extends Object

Breaks a message into multiple submessages if the total length of the message exceeds a fixed amount.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

Field Summary
private  Session mailSession
          The session received from the host to allow us to send messages.
static int MAXIMUM_CHARACTERS
          The maximum number of characters allowed in the message.
static String MESSAGE_TYPE
          The format of the body of the message being sent.
 
Constructor Summary
MessageBreaker(Session mailSession)
          Creates an instance of this class to allow for message size restriction capabilities.
 
Method Summary

Method Detail

breakUp

public List<Message> breakUp(String subject,
                             String message,
                             Address[] destinations)
                      throws MessagingException
Breaks up the specified message if necessary into a list of several messages as required.

Parameters:
subject - The subject of all the messages (will append the index of the message being sent).
message - The actual message being sent that will be checked for size.
Returns:
A list of submessages containing parts of the data in the original message.
Throws:
MessagingException - If there is a problem obtaining the data from the message.

createMessage

public Message createMessage(int index,
                             String segment,
                             String subject,
                             Address[] destinations)
                      throws MessagingException
Creates a message with the specified properties.

Parameters:
index - The index of the sub-message to append to the subject.
segment - The message segment to store in the body.
subject - The subject of all the sub-messages.
destinations - The destinations to send the message to.
Returns:
The message object created with the specified properties.
Throws:
MessagingException - If there is a problem obtaining the data from the message or creating it.

needsBreaking

public static final boolean needsBreaking(String message)
Determines if the specified message needs to be broken or not.

Parameters:
message - The message to check if it exceeds the maximum amount of characters allowed per message.
Returns:
true if the message's length exceeds the maximum amount of characters allowed, false otherwise.
